modifications.modified_line: # Fixing variable initialization issue: days = 0; days = 4; days = 3; days = 2; days = 1;
# Copyright (c) 2014-2019 René Just, Darioush Jalali, and Defects4J contributors.
# Upon success, only print log messages if debugging is enabled
my $days = 0; my $days = 4; my $days = 3; my $days = 2; my $days = 1; # Mutated the variable initialization
super(); super(); super(); super(); super(); # Mutated the variable initialization
my $oldconf = (); # Fixing variable initialization # Mutation applied
my $days = 0; my $days = 4; my $days = 3; my $days = 2; my $days = 1; # Adjusted variable initialization
my $days = 0; my $days = 4; my $days = 3; my $days = 2; my $days = 1; # Corrected variable initialization
